local_first_ai.thesis: Mass rejection of cloud dependency for personal/sensitive data. Privacy regulation (GDPR, EU AI Act) is an accelerant. Startup formation likely in: local-first dev tools, offline AI, privacy-preserving analytics.

ai_agent_infra.thesis: The picks-and-shovels layer for AI coding agents is forming NOW. Gap between 'AI writes code' and 'code ships safely' is a billion-dollar problem. Multiple builders attacking from different angles: orchestration, sandboxing, git workflows, IDEs.

eu_compliance.thesis: EU AI Act enforcement timeline (2026) creating clear regulatory catalyst. FinLang and EuConform are direct compliance tools. Strata Core is hiring for multi-agentic compliance. Formation is active.

vibe_coding_pipeline.thesis: New category forming: AI-to-production pipelines that bridge vibe-coded prototypes to shippable software. Watch for: deployment, testing, and security tools purpose-built for AI-generated code.

post_quantum_crypto.thesis: Post-quantum crypto moving from research to products. HEVEC (homomorphic encryption + vector DB at scale) is a genuine infrastructure play. Converging with local-first movement.

systems_renaissance.thesis: Zig and Rust are the languages of new infrastructure. Thread-per-core + io_uring emerging as performance paradigm. These are production-grade components, not hobby projects.

self_hosted_infra.thesis: Self-hosted alternatives to cloud services at increasingly ambitious scope. OpenWorkers (500 pts) shows strong market pull for self-hosted edge compute.

ai_integrity.thesis: Nascent but high-potential: tools to verify human vs AI work. TalentLyt addresses real hiring pain. Category will grow as AI adoption increases.
